about.title: About me
about.me: I am from Viam√£o - RS, next to Porto Alegre. I am a Systems Analysis and Development student at Unisenac College, in my 4th semester. I am currently looking to make a career transition and my goal is to become a Fullstack Developer. Today, in addition to college, I do my best to study in my free time and develop projects to consolidate my skills. I currently have experience and projects in some technologies such as
